casebody.data:
Morris C. Mengis, Appellant, v. The Mayor, &c., Respondents. Decided July 22, 1886. Appeal from judgment. Fleischman & May, for the appellant. E. Henry Lacombe, corporation counsel, and Arthur H. Masten and John J. Townsend, Jr., for the respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Truax and O’Gorman, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs, on the opinion of the trial judge.
